status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This looks weird... However, there is something common among those stacktraces: In both cases, it seems to be a ThreadLocal variable that's suddenly null - and in both cases, the ThreadLocal variable is not declared as final (some of the ThreadLocals in Spring are final, some are not). So I assume Tomcat does something weird to non-final ThreadLocals there. .. Hence, I have declared all of those ThreadLocals as final, which generally makes sense and should hopefully fix this issue. This should be available in the next nightly snapshot - please give it a try and let me know whether it works for you!

Juergen

Assumed to be fixed. To be reopened in case of remaining issues.

Juergen
